title: The Pitiful Me Does Not Need a Dazzling Life - Novel Updates
genre: Comedy   Ecchi   Romance   School Life   Slice of Life
author: 白丝妹丶控
description:
I had once decided to never let you get hurt…

I had once sworn to protect you no matter what…

I had once promised to always love you…

Turns out, I did not manage to do any of those…

After the much-praised thing called “Youth” gave me a rude awakening…

All I want… Is a normal and peaceful life…>
